--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Oops.  Here's the other half of my last message.
> 
> ::Pyrotaur/Aquataur::
>        Pyrotaur speaks up first.  "I'm Pyrotaur.  I'm the dolt that 
> accidently gave our boss a mean streak."  He looks over to 
Aquataur.  "I just 
> thought I'd save you the trouble."
> 
>        Aqua taur growls at him.  "I'm Aquataur.  I'm the science 
officer and 
> medic of the team.  I'd be happy to offer my services should they 
be 
> nescesary."
